data.title: Estimate: EUR 15,000 to EUR 20,000
data.meta_description: (Mozhaysk 1885–1964 Moscow) Kislovodsk, signed in Cyrillic script, oil on canvas, 100 x 77 cm, framed (Rei)   We are grateful to Dr Olga Sugrobova-Roth for her scientific assistance This painting belongs to a series of views of the spa town of Kislovodsk in Southern Russia, which the artist executed in 1938. Сергей Васильевич Герасимов (Можайск, 1885 – 1964, Москва) Кисловодск Подпись справа внизу: Сергей ГерасимовХолст, масло. 100 х 77 см. РамаПроисхождение: частное собрание, ЛитваКартина из серии городских видов Кисловодска, выполненных художником в 1938 году.
data.text:
At present, there is no adequate level of data protection in the USA, and it cannot be excluded that state security authorities may issue corresponding orders to the third-party providers (Google and Meta Platforms, Inc.) to gain access to the aforementioned data for control and monitoring purposes. There are no effective remedies or legal protection against this. Moreover, the US does not provide adequate guarantees for the protection of personal data. However, since we only forward your IP address (in shortened form, so that no clear identification is possible) and technical information such as browser, Internet provider, terminal device and screen resolution to Google, we consider the risk to be moderate and the probability of actual access to your data rather low.

When you visit our website, the following data, among others, is recorded:

Pages viewed

Your behaviour on the pages (e.g. clicks, scrolling behaviour and stay time length)

Your approximate location (country and city)

Your IP address (in shortened form, so that no clear identification is possible)

Technical information including browser, internet provider, terminal device and screen resolution

Source of your visit (i.e. via which website or advertising material you came to us)
